publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1158 Marlyn Glen: Yellow Flag Seaside Award for Broughty Ferry-That the Parliament notes the award of the prestigious Yellow Flag Seaside Award for Broughty Ferry beach for the first time; congratulates the people of Broughty Ferry and the members of the community council on their work towards this achievement; acknowledges the contribution made by Dundee City Council and other local organisations in this award, and recognises the role played by investment in wastewater treatment made possible by the Tay Wastewater project.
S2M-1158 Yellow Flag Seaside Award for Broughty Ferry (lodged on 8 April 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1158 Yellow Flag Seaside Award for Broughty Ferry (lodged on 8 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
